name: Lucky Strike
description:
An abstract horror game about hunt and anxiety.

You got one bullet, and thus one chance to take HIM down.

Headphones required. QWERTY only.

Made in 48 Hours for the Asylum Jam 2014 #asylumjam

by

Anthony Krafft (Game Design)

Joseph Le Gall (Programming)

Axel Deshors (Programming)

Marc-Antoine Archier (Sound Design)

Baptiste Poligné (Graphic Design)
